org.apache.log4j.spi

接口 Configurator

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DefaultLF5Configurator, DOMConfigurator, PropertyConfigurator, ReloadingPropertyConfigurator

    public interface Configurator
    Implemented by classes capable of configuring log4j using a URL.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
    作者:
    Anders Kristensen

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.lang.String INHERITED
      Special level value signifying inherited behaviour.
      static java.lang.String NULL
      Special level signifying inherited behaviour, same as INHERITED.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void doConfigure(java.io.InputStream inputStream, LoggerRepository repository)
      Interpret a resource pointed by a InputStream and set up log4j accordingly.
      void doConfigure(java.net.URL url, LoggerRepository repository)
      Interpret a resource pointed by a URL and set up log4j accordingly.

    • 字段详细资料

      • INHERITED

        static final java.lang.String INHERITED
        Special level value signifying inherited behaviour. The current value of this string constant is inherited. NULL is a synonym.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • NULL

        static final java.lang.String NULL
        Special level signifying inherited behaviour, same as INHERITED. The current value of this string constant is null.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • doConfigure

        void doConfigure(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
               LoggerRepository repository)
        Interpret a resource pointed by a InputStream and set up log4j accordingly. The configuration is done relative to the hierarchy parameter.
        参数:
        inputStream - The InputStream to parse
        repository - The hierarchy to operation upon.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.2.17

      • doConfigure

        void doConfigure(java.net.URL url,
               LoggerRepository repository)
        Interpret a resource pointed by a URL and set up log4j accordingly. The configuration is done relative to the hierarchy parameter.
        参数:
        url - The URL to parse
        repository - The hierarchy to operation upon.
